Week for Iran-Korea friendship opens
articles.content:
Week for Iran-Korea friendship opens
    Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- A ceremony was held in Teheran on May 19 to open the week for Iran-Korea friendship.
 Addressing the ceremony, the advisor to the minister of culture and Islamic guidance of Iran said Iran regards the DPRK as the most friendly country and will never forget its support to Iran.    
 The reunification of Korea is the greatest desire of its nation, he said, adding: Iran has supported the Korean people's stand for national reunification on the international arena over the past years and will as ever do its utmost to do so.

Protest visit paid to "ministry of unification" in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest visit paid to "ministry of unification" in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, May 25 (KCNA) -- The permanent executive chairman and members of the reunification solidarity for the implementation of the June 15 South-North Joint Declaration and peace on the Korean Peninsula reportedly paid a protest visit to the "ministry of unification" on May 21.
 They demanded a responsible answer from the "minister" who was involved in the abortion of the working-level contact between the south and the north for a successful holding of the June 15 grand festival for national reunification.    
 At the end of the visit, they declared that they would conduct sit-ins, press conference, all-people rally and other activities for the successful holding of the festival.
